description: Shake up dinner this week, starting with broccolini and black bean quesadillas served with lime. Plus, sneak in extra veg without anyone noticing.
keywords: Quesadilla,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Broccolini,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Broccolini & Black Bean Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: lime wedges, Tabasco sauce (optional) and green salad, to serve
420g no added salt black beans, rinsed, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tbs oil in a small saucepan over mediumhigh heat. Add flour and stir for 1 minute. Gradually add milk, whisking until smooth. Stir for 5 minutes or until white sauce boils and thickens. Season to taste.
Spread each wrap evenly with 1/4 cup white sauce and cover half of each wrap with broccolini, capsicum, beans and cheese. Fold over and press down firmly to seal.

Heat 1 tsp of remaining oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook wraps, 2 at a time, for 2 minutes on each side or until golden brown and toasted. Remove from pan and cover loosely with foil to keep warm. Repeat with remaining oil and tortillas.
Cut quesadillas in half and serve hot with lime wedges, hot sauce, if using, and a green salad.
